sources.title: Yellow Sky (1948)
sources.description: In 1867, a gang robs a bank and flees into the desert. Out of water, the outlaws encounter a ghost town called Yellow Sky and its only residents, a hostile young woman and her grandfather. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/yellow-sky-1948/

metadata.Plot: A band of bank robbers on the run from a posse flee into the desert. Near death from lack of water they stumble into what appears to be a ghost town, only to discover an old prospector and his granddaughter living there. The robbers discover that the old man has been mining gold and set out to make a quick fortune by robbing the pair. Their plan runs foul when the gang leader, Stretch, falls for the granddaughter, which sets off a showdown between the entire gang.
metadata.Writer: Lamar Trotti, W.R. Burnett, Jacques Monteux
metadata.Actors: Gregory Peck, Anne Baxter, Richard Widmark
